程序包 carte

类 Joueur

java.lang.Object
carte.Joueur
public class Joueur
extends java.lang.Object
A class representing the joueur in the game Shape up.

Class Joueur mainly contains the following functions: setting the carteNow currently in the player's hand, setting player's name, setting player's victory card, getting the player's score, printing out who wins, etc. For exemple: 

     Joueur joueur = new Joueur();
     joueur.getScore()();
从以下版本开始:
13 January 2021
版本:
%I%
作者:
WU Zhongyang, GUAN Mingjun
另请参阅:
Carte

    This method is used to print out the winner

    This method is used to print out the lose player(s)

    This method is used to set the player's score to zero.

    This method gets the card currently in the player's hand.

    This method gets the name of the player.

    This method gets the score of the player.
    Carte getVictoryCarte()
    This method gets the victory card of the player.

    This method is used for the player to get a card and this card is carteNow which is the card currently in the player's hand.

    This method sets the name of the player.
    void setScore​(int s)
    This method sets the score of the player.

    This method sets up the victory card of the player.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Joueur

      public Joueur​(java.lang.String nom)
      This is the constructor of the class Joueur which defines the player's name.
      参数:
      nom - The name of the joueur

  • 方法详细资料

    • prendreCarte

      public void prendreCarte​(Carte carte)
      This method is used for the player to get a card and this card is carteNow which is the card currently in the player's hand.
      参数:
      carte - The card that the player gets.

    • getCarteNow

      public Carte getCarteNow()
      This method gets the card currently in the player's hand.
      返回:
      The card currently in the player's hand.

    • getVictoryCarte

      public Carte getVictoryCarte()
      This method gets the victory card of the player.
      返回:
      The victory card of the player

    • setVictoryCarte

      public void setVictoryCarte​(Carte c)
      This method sets up the victory card of the player.
      参数:
      c - The card to be set as the player's victory card

    • aGagne

      public java.lang.String aGagne()
      This method is used to print out the winner
      返回:
      the String who wins

    • aPerdu

      public java.lang.String aPerdu()
      This method is used to print out the lose player(s)
      返回:
      the String who loses

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      This method gets the score of the player.
      返回:
      the score of the player

    • setScore

      public void setScore​(int s)
      This method sets the score of the player.
      参数:
      s - The score to be set as the player's score

    • addScore

      public void addScore​(int s)
      This method is used for the sum of the scores.
      参数:
      s - The score to be added

    • ClearScore

      public void ClearScore()
      This method is used to set the player's score to zero.
